name: Ouranos
description:
[ WARNING! Super old teenager project! ]
but I thought it would be cool to share it :)

Description

Ouranos is a very classical shoot-them-up. It's endless, so you can play as long as you want. It's quite an old project, I started it in 2001, but it was redesigned a few times before getting the current form in 2010. For the technical part, it's made in C++ with OpenGL and GLUT. I made the graphics with 3DStudio at that time.

The title screen is in French, but you don't really need it.

Features
  • Mouse only controls
  • Endless game
  • 8 different weapons
  • Old school scrolling shoot-them-up
  • Space background that repeats quite well!
Controls
  • Mouse to move
  • Left click for normal shoot
  • Right click for bombs
